citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 22-
SEPT-2021. Upon arrival the inspector called and left message with the licensee, the inspector then went to the font desk
and announced his presence at which time the licensee returned his call. He stated that he was out of town and could not
return within 1 hour. He stated that no responsiple adult was present to complete the inspection. Inspector then left the
site.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b) 
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 10:00am on 22-
SEPT-2021. Upon arrival the inspector called and left message with the licensee, the inspector then went to the font desk 
and announced his presence at which time the licensee returned his call. He stated that he was out of town and could not 
return within 1 hour. He stated that no responsiple adult was present to complete the inspection. Inspector then left the 
site. 
 
 
 
End Section
